title: Five-Star Harbourside Escape in Malaysian Borneo
description: Experience a five-star escape in tropical Malaysian Borneo - known for being one of only two places on earth where you can see orangutans in their native rainforest habitat, 4,095-metre-tall Mt. Kinabalu and stunning turquoise-fringed desert islands. Spend six days/five nights in a newly refurbished room at Le Méridien Kota Kinabalu on Kota Kinabalu's famous waterfront esplanade and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, a multi-course poolside dinner featuring local Sabahan cuisine, poolside cocktails, afternoon tea, late checkout and more for only $799 for two adults, valued up to $2,363.
location_description: Le Meridien Kota Kinabalu [192692] Five-Star Borneo Escape in Malaysia
offer_address: LocationJalan Tun Fuad Stephens, Kota Kinabalu Kota Kinabalu

title: Five-Star Beachfront Glamour in Langkawi, Malaysia
description: Escape the winter and discover the pinnacle of five-star luxury at The Datai Langkawi - Malaysia’s #2 top hotel as voted by TripAdvisor. Famed for its white-sand beaches, secret offshore islands, colourful reefs and jungles filled with monkeys, Langkawi is a peaceful paradise where you can do as much or as little as you want. Spend five nights in a glamorous Canopy Deluxe room amidst the rainforest and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, private return airport transfers, two three-course dinners at your choice of the resort’s three restaurants, nightly cocktails, massages in the jungle, $400 flight credit, 20-percent off the resort’s award-winning Championship Golf Course and more for only $999 per person (twin share), valued up to $4,048. Watch the resort video below.
location_description: The Datai - Langkawi [196244] Five-Star Beachfront Glamour in Langkawi, Malaysia

title: Shangri-La Splendour in Exotic Malaysia
description: Soak up the exotic beauty of Malaysia’s Penang, staying close to the UNESCO World Heritage-listed George Town at Shangri-La’s Rasa Sayang Resort & Spa. A luxurious five-star haven, this beachfront resort is perfect for couples and families alike, with beautiful pools, a mini golf course, a spa and much more. Enjoy five nights in a Deluxe Seaview Room with daily breakfasts, three dining experiences, a 60-minute massage each at the resort’s spa and more for just $1,399 for two adults, valued up to $2,382. Watch the exclusive video below.
location_description: Shangri-La's Rasa Sayang Resort & Spa [208849] Shangri-La Splendour in Exotic Malaysia

title: Daily breakfasts, dining, massages and more
description: Explore the tropical beauty of Borneo, Malaysia, at The Magellan Sutera Resort - part of a five-star beachfront complex with a golf course, five restaurants and lounges, a spa and more. Your five-night stay includes return airport transfers, daily buffet breakfasts, three dining experiences, three massages each and much more for two adults.
offer_address: The Magellan Sutera Resort, 1 Sutera Harbour Boulevard, Sutera Harbour, 88100 Kota Kinabalu, Sabah, Malaysia

title: Four Seasons Indulgence in Langkawi, Malaysia
description: Experience a once-in-a-lifetime paradise at The Four Seasons Resort Langkawi - a beachfront hideaway nestled between a 550-million-year-old rainforest and a beautiful white sandy beach in a UNESCO-listed Geopark. Enjoy five nights at the incredible Four Seasons Resort Langkawi and enjoy VIP private return airport transfers, daily buffet breakfasts, nightly pre-dinner cocktails at the resorts Middle-Eastern inspired lounge, a 60-minute signature massage each, a three-course dining experience and more. Plus, enjoy a two-night stopover before your beach stay at the Renaissance Kuala Lumpur in the heart of KL with VIP Lounge access and benefits. Upgrade and enjoy nightly three-course dinners at the Four Seasons Resort Langkawi. Watch the exclusive resort video below.
location_description: Four Seasons Resort Langkawi [209281] Four Seasons Indulgence in Langkawi, Malaysia
offer_address: Jalan Tanjung Rhu, Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Shangri-La's Rasa Ria Luxury in Malaysian Borneo
description: Experience a five-star escape in tropical Malaysian Borneo - known for being one of only two places on earth where you can see orangutans in their native rainforest habitat. Set amongst 400-acres of beachfront rainforest, you can spend seven nights at the five-star Shangri-La's Rasa Ria Resort with private return airport transfers, daily buffet breakfasts, one 'Breakfast with a View' experience as the sun rises over Mt. Kinabalu, two buffet dinners showcasing fresh island produce from street food-style stalls, daily beers and wines, spa treatments, a round of 18-hole golf, a guided night walk to spot local wildlife and more for only $899 per person (twin share), valued up to $3,776. Watch the exclusive resort video below.
location_description: Shangri-La's Rasa Ria Resort [211806] Shangri-La Beachside Luxury in Malaysian Borneo
offer_address: Pantai Dalit Beach, Tuaran, 89208 Kota Kinabalu, KK, Malaysia

title: Four Seasons Beachfront Indulgence in Langkawi, Malaysia
description: Experience a once-in-a-lifetime paradise at The Four Seasons Langkawi - a beachfront hideaway ensconced between a 550-million-year-old rainforest and a beautiful white sandy beach. Enjoy the ultimate luxury escape with five nights at the incredible Four Seasons Langkawi including daily buffet breakfasts, nightly lavish Four Seasons dinners, a 60-minute signature massage each, VIP private airport transfers, nightly pre-dinner cocktails, Malaysia Airlines flight credit valued up to $400, an eagle safari and more! PLUS a two-night five-star club stopover at the Renaissance Kuala Lumpur in the heart of KL with VIP Lounge access and benefits. Only $3,999 for two adults, valued up to $8,074. Watch the exclusive resort video below.
location_description: Four Seasons Resort Langkawi [202259] Four Seasons Beachfront Indulgence in Langkawi, Malaysia
offer_address: Jalan Tanjung Rhu, Langkawi, Kedah, Malaysia

title: Private Pool Villa Luxury in Koh Samui
description: Luxurious beachfront Thai villa escape on the island of Koh Samui - just a short, one-hour flight from Bangkok. Spend six days/five nights in a One-Bedroom Private Pool Villa and enjoy daily restaurant or in-villa breakfasts, four massages, in-villa Thai cooking class with four-course meal, a tapas lunch, daily cocktails, complimentary bottle of sparkling wine on arrival, return airport transfers and more. Only $1,399 for two people, valued up to $3,194.
location_description: Kanda Residences Pool Villa [198146] Private Pool Villa Luxury in Koh Samui*

title: The Pinnacle of Luxury at The St. Regis Langkawi
description: Experience five-star beachfront opulence at its finest, staying at the stunning The St. Regis Langkawi in Malaysia. Indulge in an above and beyond luxury experience brought you by one of the world's most exquisite hotel brands with six days/five nights staying in a Premier Rainforest room with Signature St. Regis Butler Service to cater to your every whim. Enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, private return airport transfers in a luxury vehicle, a three-course dining experience at the chic L'Orangerie Signature Restaurant, nightly pre-dinner cocktails, a 60-minute Urut Melayu massage each and more for only $1,499 for two adults, valued up to $3,273. Check out the resort video below.
location_description: St. Regis Langkawi [204109] The Pinnacle of Luxury at The St. Regis Langkawi OLD

title: Shangri-La Luxury in the Heart of Kuala Lumpur
description: Experience five-star Shangri-La luxury in Malaysia's exciting capital city of Kuala Lumpur, the gateway to tropical Borneo, cultural Penang and beachfront Langkawi. Spend two nights in a Horizon Club Executive Room at the Shangri-La Kuala Lumpur located near the iconic Petronas Twin Towers, Batu Caves and an abundance of restaurants, street food markets and shopping malls. Includes VIP club privileges like daily breakfasts, nightly pre-dinner cocktails and daily afternoon tea, plus enjoy a delicious buffet dining experience and more for only $499 for two adults, valued up to $902. Check out the video below.
location_description: Shangri-La Hotel Kuala Lumpur [208385] Shangri-La Luxury in the Heart of Kuala Lumpur
offer_address: 11, Jalan Sultan Ismail, Bukit Bintang, Kuala Lumpur
